name: Apothecaria - Halloween Expansion
description:
As befitting such a spoooky time of year, this Apothecaria expansion expands upon the Halloween / Samhain inspired Bogle's Night festival with all manner of new Ailments, Reagents, Locales, and responsibilities!

As the witch of High Rannoc it is your duty to:

* Make a deal with the Keeper of The Manor, a mysterious structure that appears when the veil between worlds is thin and houses all manner of monsters. Will they ask you to stay with them in the hopes of winning your heart? Or to host the Spooky Soiree at The Manor this year? Or even to house one of their residents until next year?

* Ferry the dead from The Other World. Sometimes they get lost and the villagers ask for your help in finding them.

* Put on the best Bogle's Night display! Hire skeletons from Hero's Hollow, enchant instruments for a haunting melody, or just buy a bunch of decorations from the village shop and call it a night.

And even if your own Apothecaria playthrough hasn't reached the month of Harvest, then you can still enjoy a stroll through the Weaver's Wood. Just, don't touch the webs.

This expansion requires the base game Apothecaria to play.

This expansion takes place during the last 4 Weeks of Harvest.
